original_text: And the Lord hath avouched thee this day to be his peculiar people, as he hath promised thee, and that thou shouldest keep all his commandments;
korean_text: 여호와께서도 네게 말씀하신 대로 오늘 너를 그의 보배로운 백성이 되게 하시고 그의 모든 명령을 지키라 확언하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord hath avouched thee this day
and that thou shouldest keep all his commandments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 그의 모든 계명을 지켜야 하느니라
